law.text: No person responsible for the supervision or maintenance of a state confinement facility shall knowingly cause or permit such facility to be operated in violation of rules, regulations, or standards promulgated by the cabinet pursuant to KRS 211.920 to 211.945.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 385, sec. 32, effective January 1, 1983. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 361, sec. 4.
